desc: This function is called everytime a key is released.
notes: Besure to call Controls("keyboard") in the first line of the game !
The keyboard on android can be closed by the user, so to reshow it you should call textinput(true` in _touchpressed() callback.

args.name: key
args.desc: The released button, check KeyConstants Enum.

args.name: scancode
args.desc: The scancode representing the released key, check Scancodes Enum.
